trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGOTH3DOMANENCLAVE_00415_YOMOGI_000_000<tab>It is you! The one who fought alongside Lord Hien and won Doma her freedom! It is an honor to receive you, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((sir)) /var>!
TEXT_REGOTH3DOMANENCLAVE_00415_YOMOGI_000_010<tab><var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>! You honor us with your presence!
TEXT_REGOTH3DOMANENCLAVE_00415_YOMOGI_000_200<tab>My name is Yomogi, and as for what I do... Well, when our family still had our stall, I helped my parents sell dango. But those days are gone...

TEXT_REGOTH3DOMANENCLAVE_00415_YOMOGI_000_201<tab>The markets once rivaled those of Kugane. You could buy anything─even Hannish spices! It will take many years of hard work before it even begins to approach its former glory, but we will do what we must.

TEXT_REGOTH3DOMANENCLAVE_00415_YOMOGI_000_300<tab>The enclave was once a center of culture and commerce. Merchants and artisans from all across Yanxia came here to live and work...but that all ended a year ago.
TEXT_REGOTH3DOMANENCLAVE_00415_YOMOGI_000_301<tab>After crushing the rebellion, Zenos made an example of the enclave...and we who survived were forced to live in the ruins...
TEXT_REGOTH3DOMANENCLAVE_00415_YOMOGI_000_302<tab>Monzen suffered a similar fate...though unlike the enclave, none were allowed to remain.

TEXT_REGOTH3DOMANENCLAVE_00415_YOMOGI_000_303<tab>But those dark days are finally behind us! Now that our homeland has been freed from Garlean rule, we can begin rebuilding in earnest! Is it not wonderful?
